thread.title: Mutual Benefit Group Welcomes Senior Claims Representative Toman
thread.title_full: Mutual Benefit Group Welcomes Senior Claims Representative Toman

author: Amy Miller, Communications Manager
title: Mutual Benefit Group Welcomes Senior Claims Representative Toman
text:
Vincent Toman joined Mutual Benefit Group as senior claims representative on October 5, 2015. In this role he is responsible for investigating, evaluating, and negotiating settlement of multiline claims in Western Pennsylvania. Toman earned a bachelor’s degree from the Indiana University of Pennsylvania and has also earned the Associate in Claims (AIC) designation from The Institutes.
Toman, his wife, and three daughters live in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
Mutual Benefit Group is a regional property/casualty insurance carrier headquartered in Huntingdon, Pennsylvania, that has been providing coverage for personal autos, homes, and businesses since 1908. The company’s insurance products are underwritten through its member companies, Mutual Benefit Insurance Company and Select Risk Insurance Company. Rated A- (Excellent) by A.M. Best, Mutual Benefit serves nearly 75,000 policyholders in Pennsylvania and Maryland through 250 independent insurance agents.
